original_title: Lamb of God: The Making of As the Palaces Burn Album
overview: The making of the Lamb Of God As The Palaces Burn album documentary takes an intimate, 70 minute look into the making of the band's modern, metal masterpiece. Includes in depth new Lamb Of God interviews with producers Devin Townsend and Josh Wilbur.
title: Lamb of God: The Making of As the Palaces Burn Album
